channel.title: Commenti a: Hotkeys BIOS patch per notebook ASUS pre-W8

item.title: Di: Marcus Hilderbrand
item.dc:creator: Marcus Hilderbrand
item.description:
In risposta a <a href="/hotkeys-bios-patch-per-notebook-asus-pre-w8/#comment-426">michele</a>.
Hello,
Thanks for the information on what to fix. If I am successful I'll see about getting the BIOS out for everyone here.
Awesome work! I really dislike Asus but you did fine work!
item.content:encoded:
In risposta a michele.

Hello,

Thanks for the information on what to fix. If I am successful I’ll see about getting the BIOS out for everyone here.

Awesome work! I really dislike Asus but you did fine work!

item.title: Di: michele
item.dc:creator: michele
item.description:
In risposta a <a href="/hotkeys-bios-patch-per-notebook-asus-pre-w8/#comment-425">Marcus Hilderbrand</a>.
Hey! You need to fix the dsdt using <a href="/?p=148">this</a> method. You may want to use one of the bios I published as a guideline.
item.content:encoded:
In risposta a Marcus Hilderbrand.

Hey! You need to fix the dsdt using this method. You may want to use one of the bios I published as a guideline.

item.title: Di: Marcus Hilderbrand
item.dc:creator: Marcus Hilderbrand
item.description:
I know this is an ancient thread. How do I mod the BIOS of the U56E so the hotkeys also work?
Thanks!
item.content:encoded:
I know this is an ancient thread. How do I mod the BIOS of the U56E so the hotkeys also work?

Thanks!

item.title: Di: Hadi
item.dc:creator: Hadi
item.description: You saved my day. Thank you.

item.title: Di: ripp2003
item.dc:creator: ripp2003
item.description:
Thank you very much for the work, Now Brightness key work as expected for my N53sv with win10 !!!!! (Ok it's an old computer in 2019 but finally works very well) No lag, very responsiv.
I have to say WOUHAAAAAAAAAOU
item.content:encoded:
Thank you very much for the work, Now Brightness key work as expected for my N53sv with win10 !!!!! (Ok it’s an old computer in 2019 but finally works very well)
No lag, very responsiv.

I have to say WOUHAAAAAAAAAOU

item.title: Di: michele
item.dc:creator: michele
item.description:
In risposta a <a href="/hotkeys-bios-patch-per-notebook-asus-pre-w8/#comment-345">Jr</a>.
I suggest resetting the bios to defaults then reinstalling windows in uefi mode. Disable secure boot just in case. I don't believe asus ever cared about that notebook after I did.
item.content:encoded:
In risposta a Jr.

I suggest resetting the bios to defaults then reinstalling windows in uefi mode. Disable secure boot just in case. I don’t believe asus ever cared about that notebook after I did.

item.title: Di: Jr
item.dc:creator: Jr
item.description: Guys, sorry for resurrecting this topic, but I have a problem with n73sv. The notebook is from a friend. I updated the BIOS to version 306 and after that Windows did not start any more. Then the problems began. I could no longer start with UEFI mode. I installed Windows 10 again, and Windows Update no longer installed the Video drivers, Intel 3000, or Nvidia. All the drivers I try to install conflict. I tried to install the original Windows 7 and download the drivers direct from the Asus website. Not so installed. Is there anything I can do? Is there a "307" version of this BIOS? If you can help me, I'll be immensely grateful.
item.content:encoded: Guys, sorry for resurrecting this topic, but I have a problem with n73sv. The notebook is from a friend. I updated the BIOS to version 306 and after that Windows did not start any more. Then the problems began. I could no longer start with UEFI mode. I installed Windows 10 again, and Windows Update no longer installed the Video drivers, Intel 3000, or Nvidia. All the drivers I try to install conflict. I tried to install the original Windows 7 and download the drivers direct from the Asus website. Not so installed. Is there anything I can do? Is there a “307” version of this BIOS? If you can help me, I’ll be immensely grateful.
